timeline.bodyText: To guarantee all unhandled exceptions are reported, this should be .reportExceptions().  The exceptionallyCompose should handle all errors but if the runAfterDelay fails for some reason we want to make sure that's reported instead of silently ignored.
timeline.author: ajsutton
ajsutton

timeline.bodyText: We should log this at debug level to avoid spamming the logs when the ETH1 node is down.  The ErrorTrackingEthProvider will ensure a message is logged to the console periodically if the ETH1 is unavailable.
timeline.author: ajsutton
